education.summary:
• Graduated with First Class Honours        CGPA:9.08 

• Relevant Coursework: Software Engineering , Object Oriented Programming, Computer Organization & Microprocessor, Algorithms and Data Structures, Systems Programming, Advanced Web Programming , Data Science, Database Management Systems, Computer Networks, Business Intelligence, Numerical Methods & Statistical Techniques, Artificial Intelligence.

work.summary:
• Currently working with the Eyowo team to build out web interfaces that help users interact with the product - which provides financial services to anyone with a phone number. 
• Worked on front-end applications to drive NPower - a Nigerian Federal Government programme that addresses the problem of youth unemployment in the country. Worked alongside other disciplines including back-end, QA, design, and UI developers.

• Architecting and developing fully functional, accessible and responsive web applications using a wide range of tools and technologies for various clients. 
• Services provided for these clients span across front-end development to full-stack application development. Check out my portfolio to see some of these applications live.

• Worked with the software team to build software to support the company's hardware products. 
• Designed, developed and maintained the front-end application for the company's project using ReactJS, TypeScript and Material UI. 
• Developed web services for user and order management using Flask.

work.company: Eko Konnect Research and Education Initiative
work.summary: • Worked primarily with Linux (UBUNTU) as an operating system, learning about and unlocking its benefits and applications in everyday development.

anozie-stores.name: ChatValve
anozie-stores.description: ChatValue is a full stack  Real Time End-To-End Encrypted Messaging application built using React Native and Aws Amplify .       Key Features : Encryption and Security,Registration page and contact integration,Offers both private and group chats,View Online Status , Messages : Audio Message,Text Messages ,Images

whatsapp-web-clone.description: Recreated the current Netflix Application. Best part? Added the backend functionality as well.Hoping to add more features in future

scribbles-blog.name: AirSense
scribbles-blog.description: It is an Machine learning based Android mobile application to provide real time air quality index using camera images which is reliable and inexpensive . User also get Maps and Statistics of Weather.

gff.name: Search Engine
gff.description: Project Mimics the Functionality of a Web Browsers Search Engine . Implemented Splay Tree data structure , to access recent Data Efficiently. Standard Implementation using structures, nodes and classes have been used to implement this project.
